title.narrative: Strategic Sector Cooperation in Agriculture and Food Safety Between Denmark and Indonesia, Phase I

description.narrative:
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on Food aims support a sustainable development of the dairy sector in Indonesia and improving food safety and hygiene in the value chain and feed quality for the cattle through:
-An Overview of the organic dairy value chain concerning management and control -Improved legal framework and practices concerning production of organic dairy products covering the entire value chain -Improved Good Veterinary Practices focused on the organic system. -Increased capacity of central and regional government officials in the area of risk-based feed and food safety management and control -A plan and appointment for implementation of organic dairy legislation in a pilot farm in East Java created.

title.narrative: Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
